view_definition_query: select noti.read, noti.date, noti.idNotipv, noti.idaccounts, prj.name as projectname, pars.status as parsstatus, pars.statusdescription as parsstatusdescription, from consulgal.notipv as noti left join consulgal.pars as pars on noti.idpars = pars.idpars left join consulgal.projects as prj on prj.idprojects = pars.idprojects left join consulgal.list as items on items.idpars = pars.idpars
